answers.answer: I have the double chin marshmallow lady look too. I hope it goes away for both of us!
Lol, normal for your first pregnancy. First pregnancies tend to swell you up more. It goes away, just exercise like no tomorrow after your baby is here lol :)
It goes away a few days after you have the baby. You may swell more after you give birth. Its all water dont.worry
My son will be a month on the 26th and my selling was bad my whole pregnancy I gained 50 pounds lol well most of the selling went away I can wear my rings but my shoes are still to small . /:
I am really small pre pregnancy have gained about 50 pounds and am being induced tonight I'm really hoping it goes away quickly and is easy to lose

I've gained 50 lbs and 14 of it was in the last two weeks. I'm glad to know it goes away. I looked at my face in the mirror and just want to cry haha. I'm planning on working out like crazy! I'm ready for be skinny and acne free again! Lol.@krissy, good luck with your induction! I hope it goes as smoothly as possible!
Although swelling is normal make sure it isn't something more serious such as signs of preeclampsia. Best of luck
Yeah they've been monitoring me for it. No protein in my urine but I have high blood pressure and have to take it everyday.  Non stress test tonight. I'm nervous.

I was small before pregnancy too and now at 28+3 I've noticed the weight gain in my face :( I'm hoping it goes away too. My boyfriend and I plan on getting that T25 workout program that only takes 25 minutes a day so it sounds good for new parents and I'm gonna work my butt off!

question: So I'm 38+3 and these past couple of weeks I've had soooo much swelling and fluid retention and it's caused me to gain a bunch of weight. I've noticed my face is looking a lot more puffy, and now it looks like I have a double chin. :( I was a tiny girl before I got pregnant, so I'm wondering if any already mommies have experienced this and did it go away after birth or stay? Please tell me I'm not the only one!
title: double chin
